remarks: The sum of the Möbius function over the divisors of ` N ` gives one if ` N = 1 ` , but otherwise always sums to zero.  This makes the Möbius function useful for inverting divisor sums; see also ~ muinv .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)
statement:
musum $p |- ( N e. NN -> sum_ k e. { n e. NN | n || N } ( mmu ` k ) = if ( N = 1 , 1 , 0 ) ) $.
$d N k n $.
